attributes.additional_details:
We therefore mandate, that the Government rethink their aid efforts, and spend the money on struggling families back home where food, energy and petrol prices continue to rise.

We believe that this is a bad use of our money and also their abstaining from the matters of Ukraine Vs Russia and not in alignment with Europe
attributes.background: We, the British people, are calling on the Government to stop acting in a frivolous manner by sending millions in handouts to India. We believe that the country is currently ridiculing our generosity.India also abstaining from the recent UNSC vote on Ukraine.
